DOC.brief_summary: Clindamycin and rifampicin are authorized in osteoarticular infection treatment (IDSA guidelines) but some interaction is observed. The objective of this study is to evaluate and quantify rifampicin interaction on clindamycin
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacological Interaction of Rifampicin on Clindamycin in Staphylococcic Osteoarticular Infections
DOC.detailed_description: It could suggest modification of recommended doses or incitement to antibiotic dosage. Thus, theses antibiotics, if association is allowed, could limit fluoroquinolones prescription and avoid some antibiotic resistance.
DOC.criteria: osteoarticular infection staphylococcus sensibility to erythromycin and rifampicin pregnant minor dementia administration of clindamycin and rifampicin one month before treatment with enzymatic inductor
